hero.title: Crypto Pubs & Beers
hero.desc: The Landlord ($LNDLRD) ist viel mehr als ein BEP-20 Token. Drei fantastische Protokolle, passives Einkommen, Nutzen in der realen Welt, vorteilhafte NFTs und vieles mehr.

tokenomics.title: Tokenomics
tokenomics.desc: Drei Protokolle, die das Potenzial von The Landlord entfesseln. Alle $LNDLRD-Transaktionen unterliegen 8% Steuern bzw. 9% inkl. Schwankung.
tokenomics.pub_desc: Dieses Protokoll treibt alle Aspekte des The Landlord Ökosystems an. Dieser Anteil wird automatisch durch den Vertrag (smart contract) in BNB liquidiert.
tokenomics.pints_desc: Um einen nachhaltigen Wert und Stabilität zu erzielen, werden 3% aller $LNDLRD-Transaktionen automatisch in den Liquiditätspool übertragen.
tokenomics.shots_desc: Token-Halter mit min. 100.000 $LNDLRD oder Token im Wert von min. 50$ werden mit passiven Einkommen in $BUSD belohnt.

beers.title: Landlord Beers
beers.desc_1: We have formed a partnership with Crafty Brewery in the UK to release the first Landlord craft beer REKT which is an amazing Pilsner. This will be available in several stores in the UK.
beers.desc_2: Additional partnerships in other countries will be established and additional beers will be launched and sold via the online store as well as bars across the world.
beers.desc_3: Profits will be used to buy back and burn $LNDLRD tokens and may be added to liquidity as well.

pubs.title: Landlord Pubs
pubs.desc_1: Landlord Pubs will be launched initially in the UK and then rolled out worldwide. These will be driven by the $LNDLRD point of sale system providing fast, reliable, and cheap crypto payments.
pubs.desc_2: All Landlord pubs will accept crypto payments and encourage $LNDLRD holders to pay with their tokens to receive discounted drinks. Holders will also be able to purchase NFTs that unlock additional drink discounts and special offers.
pubs.desc_3: Landlord Pubs will use cutting edge technology throughout and help drive crypto mass adoption. Profits will be used to buyback and burn tokens and add to liquidity.

pos.title: Point Of Sale System
pos.desc: The Landlord have started developing a unique and intuitive crypto Point of Sale system. This will allow bars, pubs, clubs and cafes to successfully take orders, manage inventory and accept payment in various types of crypto currency including $LNDLRD.
pos.demo: Take a look at the demo, part of POS system.

nft.title: NFT Collections
nft.desc_1: The Landlord will be releasing its first utility driven NFT collection, these will be available to blind mint from The Landlord website.
nft.desc_2: These will be split into 4 variety's with an increasing rarity. Starting with standard(common), Bronze(fairly common) silver(rare) and gold (very rare).
nft.desc_3: Each variety will have a different random built in discount or ability % split across 4 areas. The discounts are scaled based on the variety.

earn.title: $LNDLRD Earned
earn.desc: We developed an app to enrich community engagement, and encourage it's users to inviting more investors into The Landlord. You can join the Landlord Army and earn $LNDLRD by just Tweeting about it.

buy.title: Buy $LNDLRD
buy.desc: There are many ways that you can buy Landlord Token.

listings.title: Listings
listings.desc: The Landlord is currently listed on the following exchanges and listing websites. The Landlord team are always actively looking to form listing partnerships and this this will continue to grow as The Landlord continues to grow in additional markets and countries.

team.title: Team
team.desc: The Landlord has a multi skilled team of technology professionals and successful businesses owners. They bring a wealth of experience, endless energy, ambition and desire to the project.

ama.title: AMAs
ama.desc: Watch our latest AMAs on our YouTube.

roadmap.title: Roadmap
roadmap.desc: It is important that we outline a paved direction for the project and what we plan to do. This is so our token holders can use this as a yard stick to measure our performance to help reassure them that not only is the project alive, but it is delivering on committed work.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.desc: Learn about Landlord Token, we have answered many frequently asked questions, and here you can find it. if not, join our telegram group.
